6671.quoteText:
You can set or amend your web browser controls to accept or refuse cookies.
If you choose to reject cookies, you may still use our Websites and/or App and/or platform though your access to some functionality and areas may be restricted.
6671.title: Blocking cookies may limit your ability to use the service

tosdr.case: Blocking cookies may limit your ability to use the service

6674.quoteText:
All fees are as set forth in the applicable Order Form and will be paid by Customer within thirty (30) days of invoice, unless (a) Customer is paying via Credit Card (as defined below) or (b) otherwise specified in the applicable Order Form.
Except as expressly set forth in Section 9 (Limited Warranty) and Section 14 (Indemnification), all fees are non-refundable.
6674.title: The service has a no refund policy

tosdr.case: The service has a no refund policy

6675.quoteText:
Cookies are not the only way to recognise or track visitors to a website and/or mobile app and/or platform.
We may use other, similar technologies from time to time, like web beacons (sometimes called "tracking pixels" or "clear gifs").
These are tiny graphics files that contain a unique identifier that enable us to recognise when someone has visited our Websites and/or App and/or platform.
6675.title: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.

tosdr.case: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.
